import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Menu, Input, Button, Row, Col, Card, Avatar } from 'antd' const dummy = { nickname: '삼바림' } const AppLayout = ({ children }) => { return (
노드버드 프로필 짹짹
{dummy.Post.length}
,
팔로잉
{dummy.Following.length}
,
팔로워
{dummy.Follower.length}
]} > { dummy.nickname[0] } } title={ dummy.nickname } /> {children} 세 번째 ) } AppLayout.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node, } export default AppLayout
